survey_name: Remote Work Productivity Tools Evaluation Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the effectiveness of various productivity tools used by employees in remote work settings.

questions.question_text: Which of the following productivity tools do you use regularly for remote work?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Ensure 'Other' option includes an open-text field for specification.
